message.body: Hey! Any word about where you'll be next year/this summer?
Hey! I took the job at Penn and I start in mid-June :)

Haha so I just took the job and am just starting to think about housing. I have been talking to Lizzy Wingfield a little bit too but I don't know where she stands. But it is definitely a possibility! :) do you know where you might want to live?
Probably west Philly? I'm thinking I'd want to move there at the beginning of June.
I would really love to live with you :P
Mine is may 19 but I'm gonna go home and sort out the whole moving thing
I think it would be fun! Just Lizzy had mentioned it too so I want to make sure not to abandon anyone or anything
Totally. I mean, we could also find a place for 3 people.
There's a queer philly housing group on Facebook that my friend added me to. Could be useful.
Yeah. I'm gonna wait to hear back from her and I'll let you know
Oh cool! Ill look at it
I haven't even looked at it yet but it could be cool.
